LOGIN.LOGIN_MIN_LENGTH: Login must be at least 5 characters long

USER.FIRSTNAME_MIN_LENGTH: Firstname must be at least 2 characters long
USER.LASTNAME_MIN_LENGTH: Lastname must be at least 2 characters long
USER.DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete the user:
USER.DELETE_WARNING:
The user is still linked to a team,
if you delete it, it will be removed from the team

TEAM.NAME: Team name
TEAM.NAME_MIN_LENGTH: Team name must be at least 3 characters long
TEAM.NAME_MAX_LENGTH: Team name must not exceed 20 characters
TEAM.CREATE_ERROR: An error occurred while creating the team
TEAM.UPDATE_ERROR: An error occurred while updating the team
TEAM.DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete the team?
TEAM.DELETE_ERROR: An error occurred while deleting the team

BUSINESSLINE.NAME: Business line name
BUSINESSLINE.NAME_MIN_LENGTH: Business line name must be at least 3 characters long
BUSINESSLINE.NAME_MAX_LENGTH: Business line name must not exceed 20 characters
BUSINESSLINE.NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: This business line name already exists
BUSINESSLINE.CREATE_SUCCESS: The business line was successfully created
BUSINESSLINE.UPDATE_SUCCESS: The business line was successfully updated
BUSINESSLINE.DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete the business line?
BUSINESSLINE.DELETE_SUCCESS: The business line was successfully deleted

READINESS_LEVEL.NAME: Readiness level name
READINESS_LEVEL.NAME_MIN_LENGTH: Readiness level name must be at least 3 characters long
READINESS_LEVEL.NAME_MAX_LENGTH: Readiness level name must not exceed 20 characters
READINESS_LEVEL.NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS: This readiness level name already exists
READINESS_LEVEL.DESCRIPTION_MAX_LENGTH: Readiness level description must not exceed 1000 characters
READINESS_LEVEL.CREATE_SUCCESS: The readiness level was successfully created
READINESS_LEVEL.UPDATE_SUCCESS: The readiness level was successfully updated
READINESS_LEVEL.DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete the readiness level?
READINESS_LEVEL.DELETE_SUCCESS: The readiness level was successfully deleted

PROJECT.NAME_MAX_LENGTH: Project name must not exceed 20 characters
PROJECT.NAME_MIN_LENGTH: Project name must be at least 3 characters long
PROJECT.BUSINESS_LINE_NOT_EXISTS: This business line does not exist
PROJECT.DELETE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to delete the project?
PROJECT.ADD_TOOLTIP: You can't add a project because you are not connected
PROJECT.COMMENT_TOOLTIP: You cannot modify the comment of this assessment

ASSESSMENT.CREATE_ASSESSMENT_FINAL_FAILURE: The last assessment is defined as final!
